name: Gold Mountain Mining Corp.
longDescription: Gold Mountain Mining Corp is a gold and silver exploration and development company. It focuses on the expansion of the resource at the Elk Gold Project, a past producing mine located 57 km from Merritt in South Central British Columbia.
fulldescription: Gold Mountain Mining Corp is a gold and silver exploration and development company. It focuses on the expansion of the resource at the Elk Gold Project, a past producing mine located 57 km from Merritt in South Central British Columbia.
fullAddress: 1285 West Pender Street,Suite 1000, Suite 1000, Vancouver, BC, CA
